title: Laptop freezing HELP!
body:
In the past few weeks for whatever reason my laptop has been freezing. Its not random cause it always happens at the very start of the game. Im pretty sure its not overheating, as my fan is spinning and i can hear the noise of it (but ive never cleaned it, nor look to see if there is dust). this also happens when i play csgo, but it only freezes randomly not at the start of games. 

Mycomputer: Dell 15 5000 (touch screen)
6th Generation Intel® Core™ i5 processor
Windows 10 Home
8GB Memory
1TB Hard Drive

I called dell but they couldnt do anything to fix it, please help.

replies.body:
hey Get Rekt Nubz!
 I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)
OMG thank you so much i think it works now, ive tried one game doing this and so far no freezinge= :))

Ooh, I think I know the solution to this! 

The Windows 10 Anniversary update rolled out over this past month and enabled the game DVR feature in the Xbox app. I recommend you briefly [disable the window game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue for you.

I'm hoping this did the trick for you. Let me know the results!
I WAS HAVING THIS PROBLEM FOR A WHILE AND THIS SOLVED IT FOR ME THANK YOU SO MUCH <3

i dont have an xbox account or microsoft account, but i did do the thing the "option 2", and now the game bar i think is gone. However will this effect league? since im worried ill dc at the begging of the game again.
